script_text: Which one is a STORYBOOK? A) Roses are red violets are blue sugar is sweet and so are you. B) Once upon a time a princess lived in a tall castle.
Book 1: Dogs need water food and walks every day. Book 2: Dogs can be trained to sit stay and shake. Book 1 is about CARING for dogs. Book 2 is about...
Put these in order from LEAST happy to MOST happy: smile laugh giggle
